## ZodIssue type

Zod issue structure for type compatibility. Matches the shape of Zod's ZodIssue type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ZodIssue = {
    code: string;
    path: (string | number)[];
    message: string;
    expected?: string;
    received?: string;
    minimum?: number;
    maximum?: number;
    inclusive?: boolean;
    exact?: boolean;
    type?: string;
};
```
